recommendations: Shashank Mittal ‚ÄúAnkit is an energetic and charismatic leader, who brings with him a wealth of knowledge gathered from his experience. He is result-oriented who seeks win-win situations, satisfying the whole team to take ownership whilst trying to motivate his whole team to contribute the best they can give to achieve company goals together. There are lots to learn from his leadership style, his knack for presenting, his sharp business acumen, and his art of balancing personal and professional life ‚Äù

Sheryl Stella Barretto ‚ÄúLife is a smooth journey if you are working with a person who brings a sense of calmness along with a fire in his belly and that was Ankit for me. Working with him was a great learning experience. Ankit brings with him an intellectual charisma, he has great leadership skills and is a great listener. He taught me some great lessons how to think before you act and reason out before you speak. Ankit is a dynamic leader who knows how to respect his team members and at the same time empowers them to take decisions. I could never relate to him as a boss as he never makes you feel that way about him..... in short. Intellectually capable with a spirit of adaptability to any circumstance that you throw at him.‚Äù
